version.change: Editors of sections can now enable discussions for that section and select which (of the already availible editors) can post to it.
version.fix: Co-Teaching profs now don't see site creation, grouping, or editing links if they are not the owner for a site. They see editing links as apropriate if they are editors.
User's Full Names containing apostrophes now don't throw errors when adding to the user table.

version.change: The admin interface has been changed so that slot and their properties can be changed along side the classes and users. Custom upload limits can be set in this slot interface now instead of editing the DB directly.
version.fix: Story problems with the [De]Activate dates have been fixed
Problems with the [De]Activate dates have been fixed
The Move/Copy UI now shows the sitename to differentiate between similarly titled sites.
Fixed the numerous bugs that were generated by the change below. (ouch)
version.change: Slots interface: administrators can now edit owner & media library size for existing slots.
version.fix: Fixed upload of PHP files bug.
version.important: DB CHANGE: The 'slot' table has a new column: 'slot_uploadlimit', which is an INT(10), corresponding to the number of bytes of the quota.
version.new: Media Library quota can be adjusted on a per-site basis through the slot database table. Add Slot interface upgraded too.
version.fix: Upon logout, the session, instead of being completely destroyed, only unsets Segue-specific variables. The previous functionality was also killing other apps running under the same session.

version.new: Added new config option: $cfg[domain] -- the cookie domain for session info. Allows session info to cross sites if they are running the same instance of segue.
Discussion links now displayed with statistics info.
version.change: By-line for default page now has a link to a "credits" page with more info about the authors.
ChangeLog is now held in XML format & converted with XSL!
"Powered by Segue" logo now takes you to the Segue page.
Permissions can now be assigned to link type sections and pages and image and file type stories.
version.fix: Headings and dividers are now properly displayed when not logged in.
version.important: DATABASE CHANGE! The class_number field in the class table should be changed in type from an int(11) to a varchar(15) and the default set to "000".
version.fix: When integrated with an LDAP server, Segue now correctly synchronizes the user and class database tables when adding users/groups as editors who have not yet logged in/been added to the local tables.
version.change: Added Dobo Radichkov's name as a main editor on Segue websites & program.
View/add slots interface: a used slot now displays a "-" under the delete column instead of non-linked "delete" text for clarity.

version.new: Owners of class sites can now easily add members of their class as an editor.
version.change: Activation/Deactivation Date form now has valid day options.
When an admin is acting as another person, they can only see what that person would see.
version.fix: The "default" page now appropriately shows sites of which a group member is owner.
Move/Copy now shows sites properly when opened on first page load.
version.change: More debug output has been removed.
